description: A vulnerability was found in TOTOLINK A702R 4.0.0-B20230721.1521. It has been classified as critical. This affects an unknown part of the file /boafrm/formPortFw of the component HTTP POST Request Handler. The manipulation of the argument service_type leads to buffer overflow. It is possible to initiate the attack remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
